General.Name: China Ouhua Winery Holdings
General.Description: China Ouhua Winery Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the brewing, bottling, sales, and distribution of grape wine in the People's Republic of China. It produces red wine from Cabernet Sauvignon, Pinot Noir, Shiraz, and Merlot grape varietals. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Yantai, the People's Republic of China.
